page.title: 11 VIEWS ON VALLEY GARDENS
page.content: My class went to the Valley Gardens to get peoples views about them.Most people went there to walk and enjoy the beautiful flower gardens.The part people liked best was the natural part i.e. the pine woods.Everyone agreed it was worth the money spent on it.A lot of people were upset that the sun pavillion and collonade had lost its organ and old-time dancing.Some older people said they should bring back the dancing when you could have a cup of tea and then dance.People we spoke to werent really bothered about the spa being developed.They thought the worst part was the vandals wrecking everything.
